body:
Comment 9: 
> Re #6, it seems that will require we set $GOPATH=$GOROOT to build them and cmd/go will
reject that setting? $GOROOT/src/code.google.com also looks strange there.

I'm sorry, I meant to say

$GOROOT/src/pkg/code.google.com

And this would have to be done outside go get, or go get into a temporary $GOPATH via
the dist tool and then a fixup later.
